lyric: Cry if you need to, but I can't stay to watch you, that's the wrong thing to do.
I realize I waited too long, but please don't move on. You don't need no one else.
Damn, is it the Fall? Time for me to revisit the past, there's women to call.
The way you got your hair up. Did you forget? That's me
I never had you, although I would be glad to. I'd probably go and tattoo, your name on my heart.
I'm willing to work it out however long it takes you.
I never said it'd be fair. But when you're all alone, I hope you truly know how bad I want to be there.
If you pillow talking with the women that are screwing you, just know that she gone tell another nigga when she's through with you.
I better find your loving, I better find your heart/I bet if I give all my love, then nothing's going to tear us apart.
I'm scared that every girl I care for will find a better man and end up happier in the long run.
I pop bottles because I bottle my emotions.
When you see your enemy somewhere in the club and you realise. He just not in a position to reciprocate your energy
I be with my nigga Chubbs, he in love with street shit, No wonder why I feel awkward at this fashion week shit,
Who told the cops where the party was? Why do I feel like I found the one? What’s in these shots that you ordered us? Damn.
Remember one night I went to Erykah Badu house, she made tea for me. We talked about love and what life could really be for me
Smoking weed under star projectors. I guess we’ll never know where Harvard gets us
I’m hearing all of the jokes, I know that they tryna push me, I know that showing emotion don’t ever mean I’m a pussy.
And shawty wanna party, so don't let yo' girl up out the house. Or there'll be shots on TMZ of me givin' her mouth-to-mouth
Roll up in that thing, got hoes like Prince, but they know I'm king
I'm just hittin my pinnacle, you and pussy identical/You like the fucking finish line, we can’t wait to run into you
If I die, all I know is I’m a mother fuckin legend
Bout to call your ass a Uber, I got somewhere to be
Yeah shout goes out to Nike checks all over me, I need a FuelBand just to see how long the run has been
Fuck em all. They only pussy niggas shootin at the star
I don't know if you know, but I know who you are. You could be big as Madonna. Just get in the car and let's touch the road
Man I told my city I'd be gone till November, then November came, then I came right back on my worst behav
Had a job sellin Girbaud jeans. I had a yellow TechnoMarine. Then Kanye dropped, it was polos and backpacks
I'm about to say a true thing I'm about to say a true thing. You was poppin back when Usher wore a U-chaaaain Goddamn, you changed
I been had these visions of the life I'm livin since I was Jimmy. All I had to do was just go and get it
I'm going through her phone if she goes to the bathroom and her purse right there. I don't trust these hoes, at all.
What happened between us that night? It always seems to trouble me.
You telling me it's only been a couple other people that you've been with/I'ma trust you, I'ma give you the benefit of the doubt.
Doing is one thing. Doing it right is a whole different story
